#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main () {
	int i, n, k, t;
	long long int x;
	long long int a[10001];	
	long long int ans[20005] = {0};

	scanf("%d", &t);

	while (t--){
		scanf("%d%d", &n, &k);

		ans[0] = 0;

		for (i = 1; i <= n; i++ ) { 
			scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
			ans[i + 10000] = ans[i - 1 + 10000] >= (x = ans[i - k - 1 + 10000] + a[i])? ans[i - 1 + 10000] : x; 
		}

		printf("%lld\n", ans[n + 10000]);
	}
		

	return 0;
}
